name: Log
description: Based on the theme Future Imperfect by team HTML5 UP. Log is a clean and responsive theme for personal blogs.

features.3: Free for personal and commercial use under the CCA 3.0 license.

description_de: Theme, das sich vor allem für Blogs eignet.

features_de.3: Free for personal and commercial use under the CCA 3.0 license.

description_es: Basado en el tema Future imperfecto de HTML5 UP. Log es un tema limpio y receptivo para los blogs personales.

features_es.2: Soporta plugins en la barra lateral.
features_es.3: Free for personal and commercial use under the CCA 3.0 license.

description_ru: На основе темы Future Imperfect от команды HTML5 UP. Log — светлая и отзывчивая тема для личных блогов.

features_ru.3: Бесплатна для личного и коммерческого использования по лицензии CCA 3.0.
